definition: Ever Victorious Army (1860-1864), Qing dynasty army equipped and trained jointly with Europeans and used esp. against the Taiping rebels

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
to snatch gold/to take first place in a competition
Lee Lai-Shan (1970-), former windsurfing world champion from Hong Kong
to win every trick in a card game/grand slam/fig. total success
National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
to return in low spirits following a defeat or failure to achieve one's ambitions (idiom)
to dress up and make up (like an actor)
